The desired return type for the result.

member.name: M:api.rightnow.com.RNOWUtil.TransientLogin(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the UserName and Password for transient login authentication. The login data will be sent with every server request and verified on the server with every request. The UserName and Password that are passed in will be 'zeroed out'. This method does not authenticate the credentials that are passed in.
member.param: The username to store for transient login authentication.
The password to store (encrypted) for transient login authentication.
member.returns: True if encrypting the credentials in memory succeeded, else False.

member.name: P:obj.api.rightnow.com.RNOWTask.TaskTemplateID
member.summary: The ID number of the task template associated with the task. A task that has this ID set is considered to be a strategy task, and they can only be associated to one stage of a strategy. The RNOWOptlItem list used for this field requires special handling, it contains a hierarchy with 3 different values for the Type property. A Type of 88 denotes the RNOWOptlItem is a strategy and is a top-level item. A Type of 89 denotes the RNOWOptlItem is a stage and is a child to a strategy item. A Type of 90 denotes the RNOWOptlItem is a task template and is a child to a stage item. This field is visible on create and update operations. This field is not visible on delete operations. This field is returned with get operations.

member.summary: The table the task is associated with. This field is visible on create and update operations. This field is not visible on delete operations. This field is returned with get operations.

member.summary: The ID number of the staff member who last updated the task. This field is visible on create, update and delete operations. This field is not returned with get operations.

member.summary: The flag that determines whether business rules run when the task is created, updated, or deleted. False - Business rules do not run, True - Business rules run. This field is visible on create and update operations. This field is not visible on delete operations. This field is not returned with get operations.
